steps.explanation: To activate a token using the provided code, I need to enter it manually. The 'ENTER MANUALLY' button is visible on the screen, so I will tap it to proceed with entering the activation code.
To activate a token using the provided code, I need to select the Fortinet account. The 'Fortinet' option is visible on the screen, so I will tap it to proceed with the activation process.
I need to input the name 'ai token' for the new account. The input box for the name is visible on the screen, so I will tap it and input the name.

I need to input the activation code 'GEAD2IZEHWDN2SLTTWIMMFX4FDUFZUSRKGBSL6NUEHTA3IRB6DAG77HOFUCCSFW4' in the 'Key' field to activate the token. The input box for the key is visible on the screen, so I will tap it and input the activation code.
I need to tap the 'ADD ACCOUNT' button to complete the activation process. The button is visible on the screen, so I will tap it to proceed.
The screen is displaying a loading message, indicating that the activation process is in progress. I will wait for the process to complete.

steps.message: The token has expired and requires a new one from the administrator.
steps.explanation: The activation process has failed due to an expired token. The error message indicates that a new token must be obtained from the administrator before retrying the activation process.
